SIGN_IN.DESCRIPTION: Log in to Transfery for Teams

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Sing up to Transfery for Teams
SIGN_UP.ACCOUNT_EXIST: Already have an account? Log In

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter your email address below. If a Transfery account exists for this address, well send an email with a password reset link.

TEXT_CAROUSEL.OPTION_1: "I forgot to create our daily route before leaving work today. I managed to do it in minutes on the go. Great product, even from a mobile device."
TEXT_CAROUSEL.OPTION_2: "Very easy to use. Transfery for Teams has the most accurate navigation of any routing software I’ve ever tried."
TEXT_CAROUSEL.OPTION_3: "We tried Trancfery because of its free trial, and everything just worked for us. There was no reason to check any other optimization tool."

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Your perfect travel
HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: So busy to plan vacation, corporate or even school excursion? We can prepare everything instead of you.

ACTIVITY_BLOCK.TITLE: Easy communication
ACTIVITY_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: Our employees is open-minded, creative and friendly

SWAP_BLOCK.TITLE: Customize your events
SWAP_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: You can customize your event or travel on the planning stage

SEND_BLOCK.TITLE: Get instant updates
SEND_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: We always keep up to date our cliens with real-time notifications

CATEGORY_BLOCK.TITLE: IOS & Android compatible
CATEGORY_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: We have mobile app and you can follow for all updates

EDIT_BLOCK.TITLE: Choose your team
EDIT_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: You can choose animators, managers, drivers and other staff

CALENDAR_BLOCK.TITLE: Flexibility
CALENDAR_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: Choose your perfect time and feel comfortable with us

HOW_IT_WORKS_BLOCK.TITLE: How does it work?
HOW_IT_WORKS_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: Synchronized delivery software for dispatchers and drivers

DATA_DELIVERY.TITLE: Automatically import delivery data
DATA_DELIVERY.DESCRIPTION: Dispatchers or drivers can add the info required to create a route. Submit complex or simplified route data depending on your needs

PRICE_BLOCK.TITLE: Choose your option
PRICE_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: Simple pricing that scales with the size of your fleet

ESSENTIALS.TITLE: Essentials
ESSENTIALS.DESCRIPTION: Perfect for some days travels, excursions and some hours events.

STANDARD.TITLE: Standard
STANDARD.DESCRIPTION: Comfy case for middle events and travels.

PRO.TITLE: Pro
PRO.DESCRIPTION: Luxury events and travels like honeymoon, wedding or your child prom.

BENEFITS.ROUTES: Max 10 person and up to 3 days
BENEFITS.TRACK_DRIVERS: Max 50 person and up to week events

HELP_BLOCK.TITLE: HELP & FAQS
HELP_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: Everything you need to know about Circuit for Teams

QUESTIONS.FREE_TRIAL_OFFER: Can I mix company and my staff to save money?
QUESTIONS.TRANSFERY_FOR_TEAMS: Can I have free short consultation to investigate company's offers?
QUESTIONS.TRANSFERY_FOR_TEAMS_ANSWER: Please, contact our administration and plan call with manager.

DIGITAL_DISPOSITION.TITLE: Digital disposition
DIGITAL_DISPOSITION.DESCRIPTION: Create, combine and distribute your orders with just a few clicks! The driver is automatically notified by email and can log the order directly in the app.
